description.narrative: By 2015, the needs of women, girls and boys living in emergency situations are addressed with life-saving interventions in timely, efficient and coordinated manner.,which contributes to Child Protection And Emergencies, Nutrition And Emergencies, Treatment Of Severe Acute Malnutrition, Wash And Emergencies. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Children in emergency situations are reached with timely and effective life saving health, WASH, and nutrition interventionsas per UNICEF's Core Commitments for Children (CCC) in humanitarian action ( HNW )
